name: Made Man
description: Made Man presents a heretofore unseen view of organized crime as players assume the role of Joey Verola and follow his every move from the jungles of war-torn Vietnam to his murderous rise through the ranks of the criminal underworld. Featuring a riveting story base on authentic events, and underscored with licensed music from the 60's, 70's and 80's, Made Man plunges gamers gun-barrel first smack into a heyday of the New York Mafia. Furious combat, edgy diaglogue and a host of illegal weaponry fuel Joey's rage, and his ultimate quest for "Family" honor and revenge is sure to keep Action-shooter fans glued to the screen.
